title: Stephen Miran Faces Senate Hearing
description: "Balance of Power: Late Edition" focuses on the intersection of politics and global business. On today's show, Massachusetts Senator Elizabeth Warren says she believes the senate banking committee should be having a hearing Thursday but she believes there should be an oversight committee investigating the President's attacks on the federal reserve. Representative Byron Donalds (R-FL) states he does support the release of the Jeffrey Epstein files and discusses the two different provisions that are being moved in Congress. United States Energy Secretary Chris Wright discusses the Trump Administration’s moves impacting the energy sector. (Source: Bloomberg)
